cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

# Wren library
add_library(wren STATIC
    src/vm/wren_compiler.c
    src/vm/wren_core.c
    src/vm/wren_debug.c
    src/vm/wren_debugger.c
    src/vm/wren_primitive.c
    src/vm/wren_utils.c
    src/vm/wren_value.c
    src/vm/wren_vm.c
    src/optional/wren_opt_meta.c
    src/optional/wren_opt_random.c
)

target_include_directories(wren PUBLIC
    src/include
    src/vm
    src/optional
)

# Set C language for proper linkage
set_target_properties(wren PROPERTIES
    LINKER_LANGUAGE C
)

target_compile_definitions(wren PUBLIC
    WREN_DEBUGGER=1
)

if(UNIX AND NOT APPLE)
    target_link_libraries(wren PUBLIC m)
endif()
